queryBody: I am really concerned about health insurance in these times and we do not know if all the hospitals accept our health card. We also do not know how this policy is facilitating us in corona treatment

queryBody: Can we use our engagement budget in the next quater as some of people in my time will not be able to use it due to COVID and need to spend time with their families.

response.response: Can we use our engagement budget in the next quater as some of people in my time will not be able to use it due to COVID and need to spend time with their families.
Since this budget is only for this quater, we encourage you to use the budget within this quater. We may issue another budget for the next quater if required
